Morning everyone. Hope you had a good weekend - bit rainy wasn't it?! Set to get a bit sunnier for the next few days in the UK at least. Meantime sending our love and support to any #wildfire areas affecting our US and Canadian friends. Keep safe x

#DixieFire, which started July 14, became 2nd-largest #wildfire in #California history yesterday when it grew to 463,477 acres.
It is <1/4 contained.
Only 2020 #ComplexFire, which scorched >1 mln acres across 7 counties, was larger, per #CalFire data.

https://t.co/2ERr3WgzxW

#USA: #Wildfire activity continues in 15 states across the country. Currently, 107 large fires or complexes have burned 2,272,800 acres. Near critical conditions with wind gusts up to 45 mph were reported over north central #Montana, and up to 30 mph in eastern #Oregon.

- 1980 square kilometers
- 198007 hectares
